specific_rule_applied: damages for wrongful dismissal can be considered 'wages'
may secure a maritime lien if linked to service on specific ships
decision_reasoning: service was directly linked to the ships
evidence_presented: Mr. MacKenzie served as Chief Engineer
unpaid bonuses (disallowed due to lack of evidence)
result_of_case: entitled to a maritime lien on the ship LE CHENE No. 1
procedure_followed: Judge Snider reviewed the case de novo
